name: AR Catapult
description:
AR Catapult is a Game Prototype I've made from scratch with the objective of learning the basis of AR game workflow in Unity.

For implementing the AR I've used the Vuforia AR kit and placed two QR images. One for the objectives and another for the catapult.

It consist in a catapult that charges the shot while you're touching the screen and launches the rock when released.

The objective is to take down the objectives within the avaliable shots.
